post.text: If you need a real scare this Halloween, just remember: Donald Trump could be elected president in just eight days. IWillVote.com

comment.author: Chelsea
comment.text: Can one of you supporters please inform us??? How did the smartest woman in the world get caught doing the DUMBEST possible things in our life time??? Sure doesn't say much for women!!! Sure you want to continue aiding abetting???

replies.author: Gabrielle
replies.text: Who decided she was the smartest woman in the world? How can you generalize one person to all women? That would be like saying all men are racist, sexist, rapists if you think that Trump is the embodiment of all males.

replies.author: Chelsea
replies.text: Gabrielle She advertises it, paying attention???

replies.author: Madelynn
replies.text: How did Nixon commit his crimes? Doesn't say much for men!!!

replies.author: Chelsea
replies.text: Sorry but if Hitlary is your example we DON"T want ANY!!!

replies.author: Chelsea
replies.text: Madelynn Tell us what Nixon DID!!!
